story_22_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: Thank you for joining my team!
story_22_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: Y’know what? We don’t need any thanks.
story_22_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
What’s most important is you really
have grown, Paulo.
story_22_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
You had no confidence in yourself at first, but you
found your way and grew stronger so quickly.
story_22_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Right from the beginning, you were brave enough
to stand up to Team Break on your own. I always
knew you were a Trainer with potential.
story_22_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I never would’ve guessed you could become so
strong. We were able to enjoy some truly
first-rate battles thanks to you.
story_22_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
If there is any gratitude to be offered, it should be
from us to you. Thank you, Paulo.
story_22_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: It makes me happy to hear you say that.
story_22_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I won’t forget any of the things you two have
taught me!
story_22_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Indeed. Though our teams may part ways,
we must all remain diligent.
story_22_04000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Y’know what? Next time, you should have a
battle with us, Paulo!
story_22_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Wikstrom... Wulfric... I looked up to them so much.
I thought that if I was on a team with the two of
them, I’d win for sure...
story_22_04000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I sought the strength I believed I had, formed my
ideal team, gave it every ounce of strength
I could...
story_22_04000/2401_1001_1800_10: But [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he’s" F="she’s" ] still stronger than me...
story_22_04000/2401_1001_2100_10:
What is it going to take to become stronger than
I am now? How do I beat [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]?
story_22_04000/2401_1001_2200_10: Am I...am I just aiming too high?
